name: Start Checklist
description: Start a new checklist

name: Tire Pressures
description: Check all tire pressures. Truck front: ?? psi, Truck rear: ?? psi, RV ?? psi

name: Retract Bedroom Slide
description: Retrack the bedroom slide. Switch is located on front panel

name: Retract Main Slides
description: Retrack the living room slides. Switch is located on front panel

name: Retract Ramp Awning
description: Disconnect ramp awning arms and slide into end rail. Retrack the ramp awning. Switch is located on rear panel

name: Close Ramp
description: Remove all furniture on the ramp deck. Roll up carpet. Raise and latch ramp.

name: Latch Door Handles
description: Close both door handles so they cover door to prevent accidental opening during travel.

name: Retract Rear Awning
description: Retract the rear awning. The switch is located on the rear panel.

name: Retract Front Awning
description: Retract the front awning. Switch is located on front panel

name: Drop Landing Gear
description: Position pads under landing gear. Then lower landing gear until kingpin just begins to lift off of the hitch. Switch is located outside the RV on the leading wall under the kingpin.

name: Fill Water Tank
description: Fill the fresh water tank. While connected to city water, turn the water valve sideways to the 'Tank' setting. Monitor the tank level using the guage on the front panel. Restore to 'City' setting when full.

name: Fill Water Jugs
description: Fill the collapsing water jugs.

name: Drip Faucets
description: During freezing weather, keep all sink faucets slowly dripping.

name: Connect Heated Hose
description: Remove normal water hose and connect heated hose. Plug into power post.

name: Disconnect & Drain Other Hoses
description: Disconnect and drain other garden hoses

name: Cover Water Post
description: Cover water/power post with plastic bag and insulating blankets if available

name: Cover Windows
description: Cover windows with blankets to provide insulation

name: Close Ramp
description: I very cold weather expected, close ramp

name: Cover Roof A/C Units
description: Cover roof A/C units with large plastic bags and duck tape securely

name: Seal Slide-out Edges
description: Seal slide out edges with cloth snakes to prevent air leaks

name: Replace Heated Hose
description: Turn off water. Remove and store the heated water hose. Reconnect the normal water hose. Turn water back on. Ensure the water valve is set to 'City'

name: Uncover A/C Units
description: Remove plastic bags from roof A/C units

name: Run Generator Monthly
description: Turn off all major power usage (A/Cs, Heaters, Microwave, etc). Start generator. Turn of city power at the post. Let generator run for 20-30 minutes. If possible, turn on 1 A/C unit to provide a load on the generator. Then turn power back on, and shut down generator.

name: Inspect Roof for Leaks
description: Inspect roof for cracks and leaks every few months.
